name: Snake (theflyingwurst)
description:
A small snake game i made.

Has ingame music.

Squares which make your snaker longer, faster, invisible, invincible and their are walls which can kill you...

Hotkeys:

move with w,a,s,d or arrow keys

next song: n

previous song: b

pause / play song: p

pause / play game: escape

(and there are keys with which you can cheat, use them if you want to)

Have fun!

(The zip is file is pretty big for a small game, because of the sound files included)

PS: Should work with linux aswell, but not tested!
